channel.title: Server Unable to Connect to, when port 43594 is open (Even with localhost client
channel.description:
Hey guys, i believe the owner of this source Has made it unable to get the server online.
So it works fine when i have my port 43594 offline and playing server on localhost with a client that connects to 127.0.0.1
But from the moment i put port 43594 online, the server is unable to connect to, even with a client that connects to localhost A kinda anti-leech.
Then a guy told me to fix this i had to look for "43594" and "Localhost"
So i did, the only 43594 was the serverlisenport in server.java , And Localhost was only found in client.java client sided, but i believe this anti-leech sort of thing is server sided, so i realy didn't found anything to work with.
Anyone can help me out with this?
i'll repp and even give a rspg reward.

item.title: Server Unable to Connect to, when port 43594 is open (Even with localhost client
item.dc:creator: @BitchPk BitchPk
item.description:
@BitchPk wrote:

Hey guys, i believe the owner of this source Has made it unable to get the server online.

So it works fine when i have my port 43594 offline and playing server on localhost with a client that connects to 127.0.0.1

But from the moment i put port 43594 online, the server is unable to connect to, even with a client that connects to localhost
A kinda anti-leech.

Then a guy told me to fix this i had to look for “43594” and “Localhost”

So i did, the only 43594 was the serverlisenport in server.java , And Localhost was only found in client.java client sided,
but i believe this anti-leech sort of thing is server sided, so i realy didn’t found anything to work with.

Anyone can help me out with this?

i’ll repp and even give a rspg reward.
